00036     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00037     void PagingLandScapeTexture_Splatting6::setOptions(void)
00038     {
00039         mParent->getOptions()->VertexCompression = false;
00040         mParent->getOptions()->lodMorph = false;
00041     }
00042     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00043     PagingLandScapeTexture* PagingLandScapeTexture_Splatting6::newTexture()
00044     {
00045         return new PagingLandScapeTexture_Splatting6(mParent);
00046     }
00047     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00048     bool PagingLandScapeTexture_Splatting6::isMaterialSupported()
00049     {                                          
00050                 const PagingLandScapeOptions * const opt = mParent->getOptions();
00051                 
00052                 if (opt->NumMatHeightSplat < 3)
00053                         return false;
00054         if (opt->numTextureUnits < 2)
00055             return false;
00056             
00057         return true;
00058     }

00061         PagingLandScapeTexture(textureMgr, "Splatting6", 4, true)
00062     {
00063     }
